Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Toronto in 2016...
Injured on 9/3/2016 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 8/24/2017 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Released by Toronto on 10/30/2018...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 3/3/2019 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 7/8/2021 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Arizona on 3/1/2022 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 5/1/2022 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Drafted in 2nd round, 39th overall pick, by Minnesota in 2023...
Traded from Minnesota to San Francisco on 7/31/2024 (Going to SF: P Ben Holmes, CF Eden Romero. Going to MIN: P Todd Cifuentes, CF Alex Plasencia)...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/5/2027, off Christopher Martin (MIA)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/18/2027, off Herman Kirk (STL)...
